## 0.18.0 (2021-03-03)

## 0.17.1 (2021-01-06)

### Bug fixes

Putting a theme after the basic setup no longer causes the default highlighter to be used with the theme's editor styling.

### New features

The package now also exports a CommonJS module.

## 0.17.0 (2020-12-29)

### Breaking changes

First numbered release.
